item.title: Getting started with ckeditor
item.description: Getting Started # Create a file ckeditor.html with the following content: <!DOCTYPE html> <html> <head> <title>CKEditor Demo!</title> </head> <body> <script src="//cdn.ckeditor.com/4.6.1/basic/ckeditor.js"></script> <div id="editor1"> Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. In est ipsum, elementum id ipsum vel, aliquam lobortis ligula. Nam vel purus eget nulla bibendum interdum at non orci. Nulla facilisi. Vivamus aliquet sapien risus. Mauris molestie efficitur pharetra. Aliquam erat volutpat. Fusce ac leo pretium, ornare libero et, tincidunt erat.
